amendment.description: To make it a principal negotiating objective of the United States to address currency manipulation in trade agreements.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1299 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 187.

action.text: Amendment SA 1299 proposed by Senator Stabenow for Senator Portman to Amendment SA 1221. (consideration: CR S2967; text: CR S2967) To make it a principal negotiating objective of the United States to address currency manipulation in trade agreements.
